text: Tron railway station is a railway station located in Wang Daeng Subdistrict, Tron District, Uttaradit. It is located 469.863 km from Bangkok railway station and is a class 2 railway station. It is on the Northern Line of the State Railway of Thailand. ==Train services== * Special Express 3/4 Bangkok- Sawankhalok/Sila At-Bangkok * Rapid 105/106 Bangkok-Sila At-Bangkok * Rapid 108 Den Chai-Bangkok * Rapid 109 Bangkok-Chiang Mai * Rapid 111/112 Bangkok- Den Chai-Bangkok * Local 403 Phitsanulok-Sila At * Local 407/408 Nakhon Sawan- Chiang Mai-Nakhon Sawan * Local 410 Sila At-Phitsanulok == References == * Ichirō, Kakizaki (2010). Ōkoku no tetsuro: tai tetsudō no rekishi. Kyōto: Kyōtodaigakugakujutsushuppankai. * Otohiro, Watanabe (2013). Tai kokutetsu yonsenkiro no tabi: shasō fūkei kanzen kiroku. Tōkyō: Bungeisha. Category:Railway stations in Thailand
title: Tron railway station
